categories.name: Starters
categories.description: A delightful selection of appetizers to begin your meal. Each dish is prepared with fresh, high-quality ingredients to awaken your taste buds.

categories.name: Main Dishes
categories.description: Explore our hearty main courses crafted to satisfy every craving. From local favorites to internationally inspired flavors, our mains are the highlight of any meal.

categories.name: Drinks
categories.description: Refresh yourself with our diverse range of beverages, including fresh juices, signature cocktails, and sparkling classics to complement any dish.

categories.name: Desserts
categories.description: Indulge in our collection of decadent desserts. Each sweet treat is handcrafted to bring a perfect end to your dining experience.
